Text: San Juan Upgrade PressuresIn our original proposal to OPS the following MAOPs were used Current MAOP Proposed MAOP Bloomfield to Bisti approx mi psi psi SMYS Bisti to Gallup approx mi psi psi SMYS Let me know if any additional information is needed Max Brown

Rough Estimate of Costs For Possible TW MAOP Upgrade Mainline Loop Lines Sta to Colorado River Cc As I will be out of town at Gallup NM this week for the excavations planned for TW L line I will will miss the the meeting on the th I have begun preparation of a cost estimate for the above given it is very rough and I am awaiting information from Facility Planning which should fine tune some of these numbers As we do not know exactly what we will plan to do at this time this is just a best guess but gives a reference of what might be expected As can be seen replacement of the mainline valves and replacement costs for the Class pipe are the highest drivers We are still uncertain whether the valves on the launchers and receivers are rated for psig and have not been included at this time for replacement I will check on this while in the Gallup area All of the valves requiring replacment will have some salvage and reuse value for potential use on other pipeline systems in ETS that will need to be converted to being smart piggable in the future I am quite sure If there are other alternatives later defined in lieu of pipe replacment for class pipe this would also drive this cost down Anyway its a start Max

TW Integrity Plan Conference Call Cc Gentlemen Attached is the latest draft of the proposed Integrity Plan for TW I would like to set up a conference call to further discuss and naildown if at all possible The call is set up for Friday March PM CST Call in number is Max

Results of TW Conference CallThe following times have been identified to make repairs on the Mainlines sections and Loop Line excavations on Mainline Section April excavations verification digs on Mainline days virtually anytime most likely April excavation on Mainline April excavation on Loopline April Maximum operating pressure from Sta to Sta will be restricted to psi until excavations and possible repairs have been made Cost estimates are being prepared If I have misstated plz advise Max

Smartpig Results Stas Stas Cc The decision has been made based on the latest smartpig results that the operating pressure for the pipeline section from Station to Station is not to exceed psi until the actual status of the pipeline can be evaluated based upon the smartpig information and any necessary repairs can be made Additionally a conference call for Friday at PM CST has been established to initiate discussions regarding excavations and possible repairs that may be needed Conference number is Code Everyone plz try to participate in this call if at all possible Max Brown

FW Transwestern A and B Cc Laura Can you shed any light on this Original Message From Michael Blount ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESMichaelBlountCblountmpiiusaEcomE NRONcom Sent Tuesday June PM To Brown Max Cc Terry Wheeler Subject Transwestern A and B We are still planning to arrive on site September and running on September th and th I will change the tool type to D Did anyone ever fill out a questionnaire on the Station to Station line Although I have the PHDs and the alignment sheets I cannot find a questionnaire and Terry does not have one If so please send a copy to me I have one for the Station to Station line Best regards Mike Check out our new web site at wwwpiigroupcom
